file_content.text: Observation speculative. Subject's identity and motives unknown; maintaining threatening demeanor.
TA-350 = attempt to repair self // K0-29 + tools = ouch
I have the stasis generator samples.
Warning: Tampering with the TA-350 Imperial probe unit is prohibited.
K0-29 = be silent // TA-350 = uploading samples analyses to Proculus Station....
Upload = complete // TA-350 = contacting Proculus Station
Yes? We received your analyses, so why are you--ah, my lord. I didn't realize you were aiding these droids.
Yes? We received your analyses, so why are you--ah, it's you. I didn't realize you were involved in this mission.
A miracle you got those samples in time. I'd hate to imagine that technology in Esh-kha hands.
Your droids here have some etiquette issues.
I'm done talking to machines.
Let them rust--that should teach them some manners.
I'm amazing.
Yes, it seems the Emperor's trust in you is well-deserved.
My pleasure.
Thanks again for your assistance. Calum, out.
TA-350 + Sith = heroes // K0-29's contribution = negligible
TA-350 + bounty hunter = heroes // K0-29's contribution = negligible
TA-350 + agent = heroes // K0-29's contribution = negligible
TA-350 + life-form = heroes // K0-29's contribution = negligible
TA-350 + life-forms = heroes // K0-29's contribution = negligible
Esh-kha = violent // TA-350 = proof
Warning: Tampering with the TA-350 Imperial probe unit prohibited. Activating violent countermeasures.
K0-29's optics = broken? // Life-form = Sith
K0-29's optics = broken? // Life-form = Imperial-contracted bounty hunter
K0-29's optics = broken? // Life-form = Imperial Intelligence operative
K0-29's optics = broken? // Life-form = pro-Imperial
K0-29's optics = broken? // Life-forms = pro-Imperial collective
Observation speculative. Subjects' identities and motives unknown; maintaining threatening demeanor.
You won't be the first unruly droid I've put down.
Don't threaten me.
I have little patience for fools, droid or otherwise.
Don't threaten me.
Get that gun out of my face before I break you.
Don't threaten me.
Unless you want to be dismantled, stand down.
Don't threaten me.
Calm down, I'm not going to break your probe.
Relax.
Granted; self-unit will not allow otherwise.
What are a couple of droids doing down here?
This is unexpected.
Mission details classified. Further attempts to pry will result in immediate suppression.
K0-29's attitude = going to get us scrapped // K0-29's order = disclose mission parameters
Acquiescing--units are to acquire samples of Rakata stasis technology from sub-level generators.
Technology allows for immediate suspension of organic matter. Application: large-scale stasis fields capable of immobilizing entire armies.
We could crush the Republic's forces without firing a shot.
Sounds promising.
Possibilities = endless // Obstacles = more
How is this my concern?
Mission + Empire = jeopardized // Stasis technology = compromised
I'm only interested in weaponry that leaves my enemies in pieces.
Immobilizing is for the weak.
Stasis fields = renders enemies helpless // Dismemberment time = afterwards
Units found escaped Esh-kha inmates dismantling target stasis generators. Esh-kha proved hostile; damaged TA-350 unit.
Esh-kha hostiles likely acquiring stasis technology for personal use. Self-unit lacks sufficient firepower to engage.
Esh-kha + stasis generators = immediate danger to Imperial interests // Sith = retrieve technology first?
Esh-kha + stasis generators = immediate danger to Imperial interests // Bounty hunter = retrieve technology first?
Esh-kha + stasis generators = immediate danger to Imperial interests // Agent = retrieve technology first?
Esh-kha + stasis generators = immediate danger to Imperial interests // Life-form = retrieve technology first?
Esh-kha + stasis generators = immediate danger to Imperial interests // Life-forms = retrieve technology first?
I'll make sure those Esh-kha don't get their hands on the generators.
I'll keep it safe.
This is why you leave the real work to someone with a brain.
You droids are hopeless.
TA-350 = grateful // Mission = saved
Collect necessary tech samples from inactive stasis generators. Preventative violence against Esh-kha inmates is advised.
No. [Refuse quest]
Mission success = impossible // TA-350 = failure
Step away from the probe.
